name: arch1t3cht's Aegisub Scripts
description: Main repository for all of arch1t3cht's automation macros.

arch.AegisubChain.author: arch1t3cht
arch.AegisubChain.name: AegisubChain
arch.AegisubChain.description: Compose chains out of existing automation macros, and play them back as non-GUI macros, or using only one dialog.

0.3.1: Close Aegisub's config file after reading it, so writes to it won't be blocked

arch.RWTools.author: arch1t3cht
arch.RWTools.name: Rewriting Tools
arch.RWTools.description: Shortcuts for managing multiple rewrites of a line in one .ass event line.

arch.NoteBrowser.author: arch1t3cht
arch.NoteBrowser.name: Note Browser
arch.NoteBrowser.description: Loads a set of timestamped notes and adds options to mark them or jump between them.

1.3.4: Update parsing logic for note texts to recognize more lines as continuation of the text.
Replace backslashes in note texts to not change the formatting.
1.3.3: Add an option to show text of the notes in Aegisub, by PhosCity.
1.2.0: Skip notes more than 15 seconds away from any existing line, by PhosCity.
1.1.0: Add transparent support for mpvqc's format, by PhosCity.

0.2.0: Add an option to also show the previous versions of the lines. With this, the format is more or less a 1-to-1 copy of the git diff format (for dialogue class lines), but in .ass form.
Added a warning if DependencyControl isn't found.
0.2.1: Clear existing markers before showing a diff to ensure idempotency.
